original_text: And the rest of the children of Kohath had by lot out of the families of the tribe of Ephraim, and out of the tribe of Dan, and out of the half tribe of Manasseh, ten cities.
korean_text: 그핫 자손들 중에 남은 자는 에브라임 지파의 가족과 단 지파와 므낫세 반 지파 중에서 제비 뽑은 대로 열 성읍을 받았으며

sentences.original_text: And the rest of the children of Kohath had by lot
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 고핫 자손의 남은 자들은 제비 뽑아

sentences.original_text: out of the families of the tribe of Ephraim
and out of the tribe of Dan
and out of the half tribe of Manasseh
